## Source: amazon-inspector (1754b82eccb103258150db62b62845428519c343aa46a0337610f74344af221e)
The package elf-stats-mulled-nightcap-782 was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (a2fe67eea55302c332422969fccd53b7be370e0435e253be66c828c5be9abf3e)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'elf-stats-mulled-nightcap-782' @ 1.0.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
